30030000.English_Text: Where are you, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</>...? It's time to eat.
30030000.Chinese_Text: 小希望到底在哪里...快回来吃饭吧。

30030001.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</> will be okay in heaven, right?
30030001.Chinese_Text: 小希望会不会在天国幸福生活呢？

30030002.English_Text:
I want to help my colleagues...
But I should focus on my patrol for now.
30030002.Chinese_Text:
我虽然很想帮助同伴...
但现在还是专心巡逻吧。

30030003.English_Text: Save me. I don't want to go inside...

30030004.Chinese_Text: 绿角大鬼这群混账...真是害死我了。

30030005.English_Text: Then, shall we plant our crops again?

30030006.English_Text:
Whether something is poison or medicine
depends on how you use it.
30030006.Chinese_Text: 是毒还是药！这取决于如何使用。

30030007.English_Text: It's amazing. Try eating it wrapped with vegetables!
30030007.Chinese_Text: 太美妙了。请尝试用蔬菜包着吃！

30030008.Original_Text: 그 녀석 어쩌다... 거기에 발령이 났을까?
30030008.English_Text: How in the world... did he get dispatched there?
30030008.Chinese_Text: 那家伙...怎么会被派到那里？

30030009.English_Text: How about a little look since we've come all the way here?
30030009.Chinese_Text: 既然来到了这里，顺便去看看吧？

30030010.English_Text:
It's been some time since I've last been here...
And it's still beautiful as ever.
30030010.Chinese_Text: 即使过了这么久...这里还是如此美丽。

30030011.English_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ape King Ogong</>! Let's see how he feels today!
30030011.Chinese_Text: 乐猿大圣！让我来看看你今天的心情！

30030012.Original_Text: 난 몰라. 나한테 말 걸지 마.
30030012.English_Text: I don't know. Don't talk to me.
30030012.Chinese_Text: 我不知道。不要跟我说话。

30030013.Original_Text: 요즘 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>그 커다란 개</>는 왜 안 보이지?

30030014.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>희망이</>? 가끔 산책할 때 나보고 인사하고 그랬는데...
30030014.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</>? He'd always greet me when he went on walks.
30030014.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>小希望</>？偶尔散步时还跟我打过招呼呢...

30030015.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>희망이</>는 날 더 좋아해. \n나만 보면 맨날 달려온다고!
30030015.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</> likes me more.
He runs up to me when he sees me!
30030015.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>小希望</>更喜欢我。
每次看到我都会跑过来！

30030016.Original_Text: 우리가 모든 걸 다 지켜낼 순 없어. \n적당히 하자.
30030016.English_Text:
We can't protect everything.
Let's not sweat it.
30030016.Chinese_Text:
我们无法守护一切。
差不多就可以了。

30030017.Original_Text: 모든 것을 다 지켜낼 순 없지만... \n최선을 다하자.
30030017.English_Text:
We can't protect everything, but...
Let's try our best.
30030017.Chinese_Text:
虽然无法守护一切...
尽全力吧。

30030018.Original_Text: 진지하게... \n여길 더 순찰해야 한다면 수양 관둬야지.
30030018.English_Text:
Seriously.
If I have to patrol here again, I'll quit the Sol Seekers.
30030018.Chinese_Text:
说真的...
若还需要继续在这里巡逻的话，我宁愿离开搜阳。

30030019.English_Text: How did I end up in a place like this?
30030019.Chinese_Text: 怎么会被安排到这种地方？

30030020.Original_Text: 야. 농사 적당히 짓자. \n너희들은 너무 열심히 해.
30030020.English_Text:
Hey, let's go easy on the farming.
You guys work so hard.
30030020.Chinese_Text:
唉，农活差不多就可以。
你们勤奋过头了。

30030021.Original_Text: 뽑을 수 있을 때 최대한 뽑아 내야지.
30030021.English_Text: You have to try your best to get it out when you can.
30030021.Chinese_Text: 能收割的时候，就该多收一点好呀。

30030022.English_Text:
Countless people and supplies come and go.
That's why it has to be safe.
30030022.Chinese_Text:
大量的人与物资经过此地。
因此更需要保障安全。

30030023.English_Text: Leave the base repairs to me.
30030023.Chinese_Text: 基地的守备就交给我们吧。

30030024.English_Text: You must be punished if you've committed a sin.
30030024.Chinese_Text: 既然犯了罪，那就付出代价吧。

30030026.Original_Text: 어디 으슥한 데 가서 좀 쉬다 올까...
30030026.English_Text: I should go somewhere dark and get some rest.
30030026.Chinese_Text: 找个僻静的角落休息一下吧...

30030027.Original_Text: 언제 오냥! 난 관대하다냥... 참는 거다냥!
30030027.English_Text:
When are they going to come!?
I'm being patient and forgiving, meow!
30030027.Chinese_Text: 到底来不来呀喵！我很宽宏大量喵...我正在忍耐喵！

30030028.English_Text:
We don't know when it'll
appear again. Be careful.
30030028.Chinese_Text: 不知道什么时候又会蹦出来...小心一点吧。

30030029.Original_Text: 왜 이렇게 피곤하지? 몸이 너무 무겁네...
30030029.English_Text: Why am I so tired? I feel so heavy.
30030029.Chinese_Text: 为什么这么累？身体好沉重...

30030030.English_Text: I won! As long as it's not me!
30030030.Chinese_Text: 赢了！吃亏的不是我就行！

30030031.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>乐猿族</>不会突然攻击部队吧？

30030032.Chinese_Text: 这周什么时候去狩猎<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>龇牙犬</>？

30030033.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비경의 자드락</>이 어디지? \n거의 다 온 것 같은데...
30030033.English_Text:
Where is <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Magnificent Hillside</>?
I think I'm almost there.
30030033.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>秘境山脚</>到底在哪里？
我觉得应该快到了呀...

30030034.Chinese_Text: 有没有办法灭绝<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>龇牙犬</>？

30030035.English_Text: Urgh! That bothers me. It really does.
30030035.Chinese_Text: 唔！真让人在意，在意死了。

30030036.English_Text:
Now, until the passage is raided...?
A countermeasure must be taken.

30030037.Original_Text: 하, 꺼림칙하군. 근데 왜 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</>님 \n모습을 한 환영은 없는 거지?
30030037.English_Text:
Hey, you're reluctant. But why don't you see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>PerongPerong</>
Illustration of it?
30030037.Chinese_Text:
하, 꺼림칙하군. 근데 왜 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</>님 
모습을 한 환영은 없는 거지?

30030038.English_Text:
I'm so worried...
Aren't the other barongs scary...?
30030038.Chinese_Text:
너무 걱정된다냥...
다른 바롱들은 안 무서운가냥...?

30030039.Original_Text: 아니, 이걸 어떻게 오늘 안으로\n준비하라는 거야?
30030039.English_Text:
No, how are you going to
prepare this today?
30030039.Chinese_Text:
아니, 이걸 어떻게 오늘 안으로
준비하라는 거야?

30030040.Original_Text: 올해 유독 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>해맞이 행사</> 준비가 오래 걸리네.\n뭔가 뾰족한 수가 필요하겠어.
30030040.English_Text:
This year's special <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sunrise</> takes a long time to prepare.
I'm going to need something sharp.
30030040.Chinese_Text:
올해 유독 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>해맞이 행사</> 준비가 오래 걸리네.
뭔가 뾰족한 수가 필요하겠어.

30030041.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>... 이렇게 빠르게 세를 확장하다니.\n어떻게 된 일이지?
30030041.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Black Dawn</>... How did you expand the number so quickly.
How did it happen?
30030041.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>... 이렇게 빠르게 세를 확장하다니.
어떻게 된 일이지?

30030042.English_Text: Hey, what's wrong with this! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</>what's wrong!!

30030043.English_Text: Where do you want to go to meet...

30034501.Original_Text: 휴... 그 방법 뿐인가...\n그래, 달리 방법도 없잖아?
30034501.English_Text: Huh ... It's just that way ... \n Yeah, you do not have any way?
30034501.Chinese_Text: 呵呵......这就是这样...... \n是的，你没有任何方式？

30034502.Original_Text: 에이~ 설마...\n딴 길로 빠진 건 아니겠지?

30034503.English_Text: I do not have time ... \n time ...

30034504.English_Text: Are you ready to help me?

30034505.English_Text: Now it's ...! \n All I found in place!
30034505.Chinese_Text: 现在它是......！ \n所有我发现的！
